name: Diablo
description: Original vanilla game, without any patches or mods.
notes:
- Original CD required. Mount it before you play.
- Use default options during the Windows setup. 
- Close the game with Alt+F4 if it launches automatically at the end.
content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files/Diablo/diablo.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: diabdat.mpq
- task:
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $DISC/diabdat.mpq
